9
Personnel
No projection possible.
Phase IV
Detailed visualization of the expansion phase of the radio
production and duplication activity is not possible at this
time.
Implementation
This segment of the National Audio Center proposal utilizes
a self-supporting, on-going activity in the initial phase
and suggests an appropriate growth pattern in subsequent
phases•
The Board of Directors of National Educational Radio (a
division of the National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters) has been on record for more than three years in
favor of relocating the network duplicating facility to
Washington, D. C.
